scripts.report:clear: node -e "const { rmSync } = require('fs'); try { rmSync('playwright-report', { recursive: true, force: true }); } catch (e) {}"
scripts.test:chrome:html: npm run report:clear && playwright test --config ./playwright.config.ts --project=chromium --reporter=html && npm run report:html
scripts.test:firefox:html: npm run report:clear && playwright test --config ./playwright.config.ts --project=firefox --reporter=html && npm run report:html
scripts.test:all:html: npm run report:clear && playwright test --config ./playwright.config.ts --reporter=html && npm run report:html
scripts.test:api:html: npm run report:clear && playwright test --config ./playwright.config.ts --project=Api-tests --reporter=html && npm run report:html
